org.jacp.javafx.rcp.action

Class FXActionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacp.javafx.rcp.action.FXActionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>, IActionListener<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>

    public class FXActionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>, IActionListener<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>
    This class represents the JACP FX2 Event listener... this class can be assigned to components, it reacts on actions and notifies other components in JACP
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
